code

You must install QR code library By typing "pip install time" and "pip install tkinter" on the command prompt after install python app and vscode by default you run and debugon vscode 


                                from tkinter import Tk
                                from tkinter import Label
                                import time
                                import sys
                                
                                
                                mster = Tk()
                                mster.title("Clock")
                                
                                def get_time():
                                    timeVar = time.strftime('     %I:%M:%S:%p       ')
                                    clock.config(text=timeVar)
                                    clock.after(1000,get_time)
                                
                                    
                                
                                def clockDisplay():
                                    backround ="black"
                                    backround = Maximize
                                    forground = Maximize
                                    
                                
                                
                                
                                
                                clock = Label(mster, font=('ds-digital', 80,),bg="black",fg="cyan")
                                clock.pack(anchor='center')
                                
                                
                                
                                
                                
                                
                                get_time()
                                
                                mster.mainloop()
